content.text: Match ends, Roma 1, Basel 3.
Second Half ends, Roma 1, Basel 3.
Goal!  Roma 1, Basel 3. Cabral (Basel) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Scott Chipperfield.
Foul by Federico Almerares (Basel).
Marco Cassetti (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Philippe Mexes (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by David Pizarro with a cross.
Substitution, Basel. Federico Almerares replaces Alexander Frei.
